text: Moses skazav, "Nash Lord, vy daly Pharaoh ta yoho elders rozkish ta bahat·stvo u tsʹomu sviti. Nash Lord, vony tilʹky vykorystovuyutʹ yikh vidbyty inshi z Vashoho shlyakhu. Nash Lord, vytyrayutʹ yikhnye bahat·stvo, ta tverdiyutʹ yikhni serdenʹka zavazhyty yim z viryachykh, do vony bachatʹ bolisnyy retribution
